body:
Welcome,

### Authors and Contributors
Heng Sok (Leader), Hin Cheng, Inhyeok Kim, Myung Lee, Yuxiang Zhou
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: This is a project done by a group of 5 Imperial College students which made the life of OpenCL developers easier by building an IDE for them. Included is the ability to run GPUVerify, a project by Alastair F. Donaldson(Leader), Adam Betts,  Jeroen Ketema, Peter Collingbourne.
name: Gpuv-eclipse-plugin
